[PT-BR]
Ótimo jogo de puzzle e raciocínio, fiquei desapontado que no Portal 1 era só uns simples 19 puzzle e o grande final, mas além de contar mais que o dobro de puzzles e bem mais elaborados, Portal 2 foca bem mais na história de GLaDOS e a Aperture Science. Quem gosta de desafios lógicos e quebra-cabeças, esse jogo é um prato cheio.
Si te gustó el 1, este te gustará mil veces más :D sobretodo con la compañía de un amigo online :D

Oh, and there is this amazing editor which can literally steal hundreds of hours of your lifetime... and you won't complain. ;)

Fazendo o primeiro jogo parecer um simples protótipo, A continuação de portal traz um fundo mais interessante para o universo e historia do jogo (com direito até a um link com half-life).
Os novos personagens são muito carismaticos, os mapas estão mais diversificados, os graficos são bonitos. Emfim, se voce gostou do jogo anterior, vai adorar o segundo. Se voce achou o primeiro jogo curto ou com cara de Demo, vai adorar esse!
Szóhoz sem jutok...(annyira jó)
Puzzle game, story game, good graphic game and multiplayer in one! I awarded it a game of the year.:-)

Mehr als würdiger Nachfolger.

Portal 2 macht alles noch besser, das Portal 1 bereits richtig machte. Ergänzt durch einen hervorragenden Mehrspieler-Part.
Un gran juego por parte de valve, si has jugado el portal 1 tenes que tener este juego que es incomparable con el primer juego con muchas mas oportunidades y con muy buenos puzzles
This game be the bees knees, son. For real. This is platform gaming combined with first-person-shooting, combined with blowing-your-brains-out.

歡迎來到光圈科學研究中心!!
利用你的"Portal Gun"從牆壁上打開兩個洞，到達本該無法走過的地方，
甚至是利用落下時重力加速度的原理，從一個點飛到另外一個點，需要的就是思考!!
而這款需要動腦筋思考的遊戲，其特色就是那吸引人的故事劇情，
一個接一個越來越困難的關卡，你究竟能否解開呢??
還有網友們自製的極限關卡，非常適合多人CO-OP模式互相腦力激盪過關，
對於喜歡找朋友一起同樂的遊戲來說非常適合!

Das beste Puzzle/Rätsel Spiel welches ich je gespielt habe. Dazu noch eine lustige/interessante Story und ein sehr kniffeliger Koop-Modus macht das Spiel einfach ungeschlagen was Puzzle-Spiele angeht. Wer es bis jetzt noch nicht gezockt hat unbedingt kaufen, sonst verpasst man etwas! ;)
Excellent game

This and Portal (1) are the best I've ever seen at an immersive game that teaches you how to play the game without it feeling the a training map.

Portal 2 starts out in familiar, though heavily tweaked environments and the first few stages are all about relearning how the various mechanics and physics work. Then they drop you into the new game after a small cut-scene.

Deux mots pour ce jeu : SUPERBE OVNI. OVNI, car voici un jeu qui sort du FPS traditionnel. Avec un plaisir pour les yeux et les neurones. SUPERBE, car des graphismes très correct et agréable. Une histoire qui vous donne envie de continuer. Et des puzzles qui vous font mal à la tête. Cerise sur le gâteau, le mode multijoueur qui vous fera partager avec un ami, une histoire inédite multijoueur.
Zonas enormes, más variedad de mapas que en Portal... si el primero te gustó este te debería encantar

Masterful fluidity in the different sections of the 'puzzles'. A hilarious script for the voice of Stephen Merchant. Entertainment on a variety of different levels, from true gaming to hysterical brilliance.

très bien !

A beautifull puzzle game. Fun just orbits around it. After you're done with the surprisingly amazing storyline and you want more of all that, well then jump in with a buddy and give the co-op mode a try. Still not enough? There are tons of community made puzzle solving levels in the Workshop for you to check out and some are literally astounding. There aren't enough adjectives to describe how awesome this game is. The story, the characters, the voice acting, the puzzles, the hours of gameplay, you'll want to see more of all that. It's not the perfect game (maybe), but it definitely is one of the best games in gaming history and everyone should have it in their library.
This game is a perfectly rare example of a piece of entertainment that is actually more clever than it thinks it is.  That said, cleverness is not inteligence, just the appearance of it.
